mapper.update: update db_itemidspc set ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HITCOUNT = #{hitcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, ITEMID, SKU, HITCOUNT, TITLE, SITE, SELLPRICE, FLAG, URL from db_itemidspc
